document_data.caption: A map showing Lac Dynnegall in northern Moray.
document_data.name: Lac Dynnegall
document_data.mainbody: '''Lac Dynnegall''' was the only freshwater lake found on the isle of [[Moray]] within the [[Moonshae Isles]].{{Cite dungeon/196/Backdrop: The Moonshae Isles}}
document_data.Geography: The lake was found along the northern edge of the [[Breasal Marsh]] near north central Moray. The [[Shannyth River]] fed the lake from its southern shore, and exited on the north shore to empty into the [[Sea of Moonshae]]. Lac Dynnegall was roughly {{SI|10|mi|k|long=yes}} long.
document_data.Notable Locations: The small village of [[Dynnegall]] was located on the lakes northeast shore. The swampy lake provided the villagers with a good supply of peat which was used for heating purposes.{{Cite dungeon/196/Backdrop: The Moonshae Isles|9}}
